cast.name: 米克尔·福尔斯加德 Mikkel Følsgaard
格伦·利斯·迈斯特 Karen-Lise Mynster
莫腾·霍尔斯特 Morten Holst

director.name: 丽萨· 奥林 Lisa Ohlin

introduction: Deployed on mission in Helmand, Afghanistan, 25-year old Thomas steps on a landmine and gets seriously injured. At the local rehabilitation center he meets Sofie, an ascending ballerina from the Royal Danish Ballet, who is helping a relative to regain strength after a long term sickness. Thomas desperately wants back in the field and gets impatient, as progress does not emerge as fast as he wants to. When Sofie offers to help him with a more intense rehabilitation plan, he accepts. Despite their differences, they develop a special bond and a mutual affection. Written by Per Holst (via Pelle Folmer)
